nodes.text: Zoraz was a deity thought to have a bulbous semblance. The Twelve Steps religious code preached Zoraz's existence and called for individuals to turn their lives to Zoraz.

Zoraz was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
